Body:
response.set_cookies(cookies)
data = b''
async for chunk in scribe.write_response(response):
    data += chunk
assert data == expected_result
pytest.mark.asynciopytest.mark.parametrize('response,cookies,expected_result', [(Response(400,
    [(b'Server', b'BlackSheep')]).with_content(Content(b'text/plain',
    b'Hello, World')), [],
    b'HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Server: BlackSheep
content-type: text/plain
content-length: 12

Hello, World'
    ), (Response(400, [(b'Server', b'BlackSheep')]).with_content(Content(
    b'text/plain', b'Hello, World')), [Cookie(b'session', b'123')],
    b'HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Server: BlackSheep
set-cookie: session=123
content-type: text/plain
content-length: 12

Hello, World'
    ), (Response(400, [(b'Server', b'BlackSheep')]).with_content(Content(
    b'text/plain', b'Hello, World')), [Cookie(b'session', b'123'), Cookie(
    b'aaa', b'bbb', domain=b'bezkitu.org')],
    b'HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Server: BlackSheep
set-cookie: session=123
set-cookie: aaa=bbb; Domain=bezkitu.org
content-type: text/plain
content-length: 12

Hello, World'
    )])
